summary.para: Specifies which members in the structure are valid. These flags are bitmasks set in the dwMask member and passed to .

The string is valid and contains the display name of the publishing source. If multiple sources publish an application of the same name, Add/Remove Programs identifies them by "<application name> : <publishing source>".
The member is valid and contains the time that the application should be installed as assigned by an application administrator.
The member is valid and contains the time that the application should be installed as assigned by the user.
The member is valid and contains the time after which Add/Remove Programs should no longer install the program.
